# colorMaximumLinearExposure

**Instance Property**

The maximum exposure to allow for choosing colors.

## Declaration

```swift
var colorMaximumLinearExposure: CGFloat
```

## Discussion

Default is 1.0, which is SDR.
title: colorMaximumLinearExposure
